project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Implement the API request to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the JSON response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement a function to format and display the extracted weather information in the terminal
Write tests to ensure the API request and parsing functionality work as expected
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
